overview: Experience the seductive world of swinging through two tales of desires that opens doors to the taboo. Part 1: The Four of Us. Married Swingers, Tommy and Britney and Cherie and Derrick reach a crossroads when Derrick and Britney want to welcome a new couple into their inner circle. The once-happy foursome finds their sexually liberated lifestyle threatened when neither couple is able to reach an agreement. Part 2:ing with the Joneses. Amy and Peter's marriage has hit a wall. So, when Amy discovers that their neighbor's Jax and Julia are swingers she proposes to Peter they embrace the lifestyle. Peter is resistant, leaving Amy and Julia to plot a seduction certain to open his mind to a new world of sexual possibility.
tagline: When your spouse just isn't enough
title: The Swinger 7
